option.name: originalContent
option.value:
name: CI
on: push: branches: [main, master] pull_request: branches: [main, master]
jobs: test: runs-on: ubuntu-latest strategy: matrix: python-version: ["3.12", "3.13"] steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Set up Python ${{ matrix.python-version }} uses: actions/setup-python@v5 with: python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}
- name: Install uv run: | python -m pip install --upgrade pip pip install uv
- name: Install test dependencies run: | uv sync --only-group test
- name: Build wheel run: | uv venv .venv-build source .venv-build/bin/activate uv pip install build python -m build --wheel
- name: Test wheel in fresh uv environment run: | uv venv .venv-test source .venv-test/bin/activate WHEEL=$(ls dist/*.whl | head -n 1) uv pip install "$WHEEL" uv run pytest -vv -s tests

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
name: CI
on: push: branches: [main, master] pull_request: branches: [main, master]
jobs: test: runs-on: ubuntu-latest strategy: matrix: python-version: ["3.12", "3.13"] steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Set up Python ${{ matrix.python-version }} uses: actions/setup-python@v5 with: python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}
- name: Install uv run: | python -m pip install --upgrade pip pip install uv
- name: Install test dependencies run: | uv sync --only-group test
- name: Build wheel run: | uv build --all-packages --wheel
- name: Test wheel in fresh uv environment run: | uv venv .venv-test source .venv-test/bin/activate WHEEL=$(ls dist/*.whl | head -n 1) uv pip install "$WHEEL" uv run pytest -vv -s tests
